title: Is skin boost still disabled?
body: I don't see anything saying it is, but I am unable to skin boost.

replies.body: It looks like they have in fact been disabled for the time being due to some backend work. I don't have a date for when they'll be back, but it does look like they could be down for a bit.
Any update on when it will be enabled? Its honestly the only thing I use my RP for.
